name: Teleswap
description:
INSTRUCTIONS:

Move - WASD/left stick

Jump - Space/A button

Teleswap - J/left click/B button

Grab/throw item - K/right click/X button

Slow time - Shift/left trigger

Teleswap to switch position (and momentum!) with your teleswap device. Pick up and throw the teleswap device, then swap with it to get above your enemies and stomp them from above before they reach your lab.

If too many enemies reach the lab and destroy your research, you'll lose!

Hit multiple enemies without touching the ground to get combo bonuses and rack up points fast!

Tips: 

  • Throwing while running or jumping will make you throw farther and higher!
  • The teleswap device falls slower than you - the later you swap with it, the higher you can go!
  • Make good use of your walljump and bouncing the teleswap device off the walls! You can get a lot of momentum from the wall.

We wanted to do a variety of upgrades, such as increasing jump power, throw power, max speed, air control, slowmo recharge speed, max slowmo amount, lab repair, etc, with the enemies coming in waves and gaining an upgrade after each wave. Unfortunately it ended up being a busy weekend for our programmer and we didn't quite have time.

Programming: Kyle Lueptow (twitter)

Art: Nasr Bin Safwan (twitter)

Music: Michael Bartello (SoundCloud)  (Youtube)
